resources.string: Looks like you\'re offline. Please reconnect and refresh to continue using YAP.

Uh oh! Enter an amount that‘s less than or equivalent to your current balance of %1s

Equivalent of amount entered should be between AED %1s and AED %2s
That\'s over your daily limit. Please enter an amount lower than %1s
A free Mastercard delivered to your doorstep
Sign in to your YAP account

That\'s not the right email/phone number. Please try again.
You\’ve entered an invalid phone number. Please, try again.
We\'ve sent a verification code to\n %1$s
Create a 4 to 6 digit passcode to access your account
By creating a passcode you agree to our
Passcode cannot be a straight sequence
Passcode cannot be of same digits
Enter your business email to begin
we\'ve just sent an email to
Please validate your email address after signing up and we promise not to spam you.
We\'ve just sent a verification email to
Please check your email to confirm that we got it right.
A YAP Personal Account has been created for you in less than %1s seconds!
A YAP Personal Account has been created for you!
This IBAN is currently inactive \n\n Make sure you have your Emirates ID at hand before we proceed
Would you like to use Touch ID to log in to your account?
Would you like to give YAP access to send you notifications?
By clicking “Use Touch ID” you agree to our
Yes, keep me up to date
Make sure your device settings for Touch ID are always on.
Enter your passcode to access your account
New OTP has been generated successfully
Tap to scan your Emirates ID
Your card is on it\'s way!
Make sure you have your Emirates ID on you at the time of delivery
Sorry, we\'re unable to activate your YAP account at this time. We\'re working on it and we will let you know once resolved.
Currently, you can only have an account with YAP if you\'re over 18 years of age. You can always come back and use YAP once you\'re 18. Or speak to your parents about opening an account for you!
YAP works best with a valid Emirates ID
Once you\'ve renewed or received your Emirates ID, re-scan it via our dashboard to continue opening your account with YAP.
Your card is ready to be delivered!
Choose your location below. We will also call you to verify this address
CRS and FATCA Terms and Conditions
Where can we deliver your debit card?
We’ll need you to enter your address below
Thanks %1$s! Verify your details so we can send you your YAP card
Hey there, looks like you\'re under 18
Looks like your Emirates ID is expired
No, I have a valid Emirates ID
Thanks %1$s! Verify your details are exactly as per your Emirates Id. You can edit the name fields incase we got it wrong!
Scan the front of your Emirates ID
A glare is detected on your document please try moving your document for best results
Please review your scanned document and make sure it is readable
Document you scanned does not appear to be front side of Emirates ID. Please rescan
Document you scanned does not appear to be back side of Emirates ID. Please rescan
Your scanned document is not properly readable. Please rescan
Face is not clearly visible in your scanned document. Please rescan
Document you scanned does not appear to be a valid document. Please rescan
Could not detect document. Please focus and try again.
There is an error saving the image. Please try again
There is an error in saving cropped image. Please try again
Great, looks like you just received your YAP card!
Now create a unique 4-digit PIN to be able to use your primary card for purchases and withdrawals
By creating a PIN you agree to our
PIN cannot be a straight sequence
PIN cannot be of same digits
You’re all set!\nTime to top up
Begin using your YAP card by topping up your card with AED 50 or more
Enter the OTP sent to your registered mobile number %1$s
Sorry, that’s too many incorrect attempts. Click on Forgot passcode to set a new one.
Your new passcode has been created
This card is on the way
Create a PIN to start using your card
Transaction completed!\nYou now have a physical spare card
Transaction completed!\nYou now have a virtual spare card
Our delivery agent will be in touch to confirm the delivery date and time. Please keep your Emirates ID at hand.
Looks like you don\'t have enough funds in your account. Top up now to continue with this purchase
You can only top up an amount less than or equal to your current balance of %1$s %2$s available on your main debit card
You cannot add an amount more than %1$s %2$s
You have topped up with %1$s %2$s \nfrom your main debit card
Now, your primary card balance is \n%1$s %2$s
Your new spare card balance is \n %1$s %2$s
Please unfreeze card to use this feature
You can only move an amount less than or equal to your current balance of %1$s %2$s
You have moved %1$s %2$s \nto your main debit card
Allow your card to withdraw from cash machines
Allow your card to be used for purchases made over the internet
Allow your card to be used for payments outside your current country
Allow your card to be used at retail outlets. This includes restaurants, petrol stations and hospitality venues
Transaction completed!\nYou now have a physical spare card
Click \'block and report\' to confirm that your card has been lost, damaged or stolen. We will immediately block your card and report it to our security team.
If you suspect any malicious activity or need to provide us with any other essential information regarding your card\'s disappearance, please give our customer care center a call at %1s
Tell us what happened to your card
We will now block your card permanently, following which you will be able to order a new card. Please confirm if you want to move forward with this action.
Do you want to order a new card?
will be deducted from your account for the delivery of your new card.

Your EID is required.\nTap to update to ensure account continuity
Your EID is valid.\nTap to update a new EID

Who do you want to send money to?

Send money to contacts outside your YAP network by adding them as a beneficiary. You can do so by tapping the + button on the top right of this screen. For now, start adding beneficiaries by clicking below.

Send money to an agent location
You can find your International Bank Account Number (IBAN) and Bank Identifier Code (BIC or SWIFT) on your paper statement or by logging in to Online Banking.
Send money to this beneficiary now?
Your email address has been changed to\n
Please log in to your email address to \n validate your email and continue with \n access to YAP!
Note that the recipient\'s bank may have its own charges.
Your transfer will be processed on the next business day.
Your transfer will be processed on the next business day. Please note there maybe an impact on the FX rate at the time of transfer.
How do you want to top up?
This card will be removed from your top-up methods

You have now added %1s %2s to your account
Your card has been added successfully
Top up now with this card?
An %1s %2s fee will be charged to your YAP account for this transfer
Enter the OTP sent to your registered mobile number to transfer %1s %2s to %3s
Your transfer of %1s %2s to %3s will be sent at the exchange rate of %4s
Your entered amount should be between AED %1s and AED %2s, and your entered amount should be less than or equal to your current balance of AED %3s
Fee: %1s\nNote that the recipient\'s bank may have its own charges.

International transfer fee: %1s \n Note that the recipient\'s bank may have its own charges.
Your card has been blocked \n and reordered successfully
Top up now to continue with this purchase.
Paying your household help is now easier than ever

Struggling to keep up with managing your day-to-day house expenses? With Household, set up a quick and safe payments to your home staff so you can pay them on time and manage expenses easily. Set up monthly salaries, keep track of household spends, and enjoy the perks of a cashless life!
Let your help choose from any one of these breathtaking colors
Give them the power to manage their salary and expenses
Set up automatic payouts for salary payments and make life easier with cashless domestic expenses
Simplify your household expenses and get your help a card with just their mobile number and email
You will be charged after you have registered your Household staff. Please ensure you have enough funds in your account for your payment(s).
Create pots to track expenses in-app
Who are you getting the Household plan for?
Payment confirmed and %1s has been added to your account!
%1s will receive an SMS with instructions to download the app and complete sign up
Let %1s know by sharing the details below:
Your account will be deducted by
An email will be sent to this address for verification
Great, let’s set up your plan
To confirm this is really you, enter %1s\'s number below
Oops! Looks like that\'s the wrong number. Please try again
Now, create a new 4- to 6-digit passcode to use YAP
You’ve successfully registered yourself to the Household plan
Your card is on its way!
We will call you to confirm the time.
Make sure to keep your Emirates ID with you
Your card will be delivered to:

Yap determines your current location. Your location may be shown on map and is used to provide things such direction and in order to serve personalize alert. This allows for a better overall app experience.
That’s right! \n Now select a card color
If you feel this is a mistake please call us at
You have been added to a Household plan by %1s
Hi, %1s you’ve been added to a Household plan by %2s
Once you click ‘Accept\', the Household\nplan will be added to your YAP app
plan will be added to your YAP app
Sorry %1s, looks like you already have a Household plan connected to this Emirates ID. Please log out and inform your employer that we cannot proceed with activating your plan at this time.

Hi %1s,
%2s has added you as their Household on YAP. Download YAP from the link below and login with these credentials:

Bank your way and become a YAP pro
Sharing is sweet, and it\’s even better when you do it with friends. Send this special link to your special people and help change the way they bank!

Hi,
I’ve just started using YAP and loving it so far, I thought you’d like to try it out for yourself. It’s not available for the public yet but I’ve saved you a special invite.

Some app features have been temporarily blocked for your security. This is because you made too many incorrect OTP attempts.\n\nGet in touch by calling our agents at %1s or message us via the Live Chat so we can unblock your account right away!
